title: Is my fast valid if I swallow reflux after it reaches my mouth #assimalhakeem #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: uh this morning I had reflex which really almost reach my mouth and I wanted to swallow it and then uh I decided to spit it out but when I tried to I think that I swallowed some of it uh after it reached my mouth so um is my fast still valid yes it is valid inshallah and you may continue
